attributes.action: do the same as they have done in America and take over mortgage arrears
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of allowing people with mortgage arrears to be evicted from their homes (which will just end up as more of a drain on society, because councils will end up homing them anyway), the government should do something to take over the mortgage from the bank and arrange a new deal with the home owner until the market turns.
